title: THEY STOPPED SELLING CHALLENGER AHRI?????
body: {{champion:103}} Apparently they stopped selling Challenger Ahri right before I was going to buy her. No one said it was available for a limited time, so why isnt the skin not  selling anymore? Someone pls help me out and explain why.

replies.body: It's a legacy skin it came out ages back. The only chance u have of getting it is through a mystery skin so gl ^_^
You can get it in a mystery skin??? That's GREAT!!! FINGERS CROSSED!!!

It only comes back during special events where they bring out legacy skins. Challenger Ahri was only available for purchase during the new season, and was then put into the vault.

It should become available again the next time an event is held. Save up your RP until then!
Ok, hopefully it comes back soon >.< if not I will be waiting a long time XD.
